channel.title: git on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in git on Dan Aukes

item.title: Git Commands
item.description: to clone a repository: git clone my_git_address Branches list local branches:

item.title: Setting up Git
item.description: git config --global user.email "danaukes@gmail.com" git config --global user.name "Dan Aukes" Update git roscd thorlabs_linear_actuator/ git status git add -A git commit -m="<INSERT YOUR MESSAGE HERE>" git push # supply username and pw

item.title: Gitman repository manager
item.description: A nice little package for synchronizing git repositories all over your computer
